title: Laravel-forum
description: This project was inspired by Stack Overflow. I then learned Laravel 9 and attempted to create a simple forum using several Laravel ecosystems, including Laravel, Breeze, Socialite, Scout, and third-party packages such as Laravel Turbolinks and Laravel Notify.

title: Codeigniter-blog
description: This is the result of learning CodeIgniter 4, a simple blog CMS application.
